title: Risotto with Beetroot Greens
ingredients: ['Leaves from 1-2 bunches beetroots (5-6 handfuls of chopped leaves)', '5 tablespoons olive oil', '1 clove garlic, finely chopped', '1 litre chicken stock, simmering', '1 shallot, finely chopped', '1 bay leaf', '175g Arborio rice', '75ml dry white wine', '50g of freshly grated Parmesan cheese', 'salt and freshly ground white pepper to taste']
